PAL.NAME: Microsoft OCS 2007 R2 - Monitoring
PAL.DESCRIPTION: Performance counter thresholds for Microsoft Office Communications Server 2007 R2 Monitoring Server.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:QMS - 00 - QoEMonitoringServer QMS - 002 - Total number of message transactions that failed
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:QMS - 00 - QoEMonitoringServer\QMS - 002 - Total number of message transactions that failed

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LC:QMS - 00 - QoEMonitoringServer\QMS - 002 - Total number of message transactions that failed
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LC:QMS - 00 - QoEMonitoringServer\QMS - 002 - Total number of message transactions that failed

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LC:QMS - 00 - QoEMonitoringServer\QMS - 002 - Total number of message transactions that failed
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:QMS - 00 - QoEMonitoringServer\QMS - 002 - Total number of message transactions that failed

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This counter represents the total number of message queue/database transactions that failed since the server was started.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:CDR Service - 01 - READ CDR Service - 002 - Messages that failed validation
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:CDR Service - 01 - READ\CDR Service - 002 - Messages that failed validation

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LC:CDR Service - 01 - READ\CDR Service - 002 - Messages that failed validation
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LC:CDR Service - 01 - READ\CDR Service - 002 - Messages that failed validation

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LC:CDR Service - 01 - READ\CDR Service - 002 - Messages that failed validation
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:CDR Service - 01 - READ\CDR Service - 002 - Messages that failed validation

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Number of messages that failed validation.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:CDR Service - 01 - READ CDR Service - 006 - Dropped messages from MQ
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:CDR Service - 01 - READ\CDR Service - 006 - Dropped messages from MQ

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LC:CDR Service - 01 - READ\CDR Service - 006 - Dropped messages from MQ
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LC:CDR Service - 01 - READ\CDR Service - 006 - Dropped messages from MQ

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LC:CDR Service - 01 - READ\CDR Service - 006 - Dropped messages from MQ
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:CDR Service - 01 - READ\CDR Service - 006 - Dropped messages from MQ

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Number of messages dropped from MSMQ queue.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:CDR Service - 02 - WRITE CDR Service - 002 - Messages failed to be written to DB
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:CDR Service - 02 - WRITE\CDR Service - 002 - Messages failed to be written to DB

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LC:CDR Service - 02 - WRITE\CDR Service - 002 - Messages failed to be written to DB
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:CDR Service - 02 - WRITE\CDR Service - 002 - Messages failed to be written to DB

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Number of messages failed to be written to SQL database.
